recommendations: ‚ÄúSaleem is a gem of a person who has taught us more about human values and how we can work as a team. He is a dedicated person towards his goal and duties but has never put pressure on anyone of us , his moto was let the staff perform on their own and results will follow after. As CEO at that time he managed to bring the company profitable and has also boost up the business volume. One thing always click in my mind that he has said ,I quote : " take the comapny as if it is your company and you will be able to perform well ".‚Äù Show less

‚ÄúSaleem Akhtar walks the talks. He takes up great challenges which he lives up to. I have seen him turn round a company and put it on solid rails while being a most likeable chief executive. He has excellent and easy human touch without detracting from his self-effaced and unassuming character. This is Saleem's forte: in a service industry, he has business acuteness coupled with HR capabilities. These attributes would make no sense were it not for complimentary qualities of honesty, integrity and trustworthiness.‚Äù Show less

organizations.title: Gerson Lehrman Group Inc (GLG)
organizations.description: GLG is driven by the curiosity of approximately 1,000 employees around the world who are transforming the way the top professionals share expertise and learn.Soon after its founding in 1998 GLG began connecting top professionals across fields and around the country. Over time, we became a membership of leading experts providing business decision-makers with insights to create better, more informed outcomes. Today, we are the world‚Äôs largest membership network for one-on-one professional learning, comprising more than 425,000 thought leaders and practitioners, including business leaders, scientists, academics, former public sector leaders and the foremost subject matter specialists. We serve users at more than 1,400 client companies in 40 countries. These clients include Fortune 500 companies in nearly every sector and the leading professional services firms and financial institutions. GLG‚Äôs industry-leading compliance framework allows clients to learn in a structured, auditable, and transparent way, consistent with their own internal compliance obligations and the highest professional ethical standards. Our compliance standards are a major competitive differentiator and key component of the company‚Äôs culture. GLG is headquartered in New York with 22 offices globally and 1,000 employees.

organizations.title: CFA Institute
organizations.membership_type: Member of Qatar and UAE Chapter. An active volunteer for the CFA Institute supporting the CFA programme
organizations.description: CFA Institute is the global association of investment professionals that sets the standard for professional excellence and credentials. The organization is a champion for ethical behavior in investment markets and a respected source of knowledge in the global financial community. The end goal: to create an environment where investors‚Äô interests come first, markets function at their best, and economies grow. CFA Institute has more than 136,000 members in 151 countries and territories, including 129,100 CFA charterholders, and 145 member societies.
